content:
Hey folks, I'm writing the test cases for p2p blob/block gossiping, and I was writing the happy path sanity test case where I gossip the block+blobs without corruption or delay and found that if I broadcast the block first and then the blobs, some of the clients have trouble following the chain.
If I gossip the blobs first and then the block it's all good.

Is there a part of the spec I'm missing that we should gossip first the blobs and then the block or have I just found an issue?
